static java.lang.String nextFile(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String ext)
          Generates auto-incrementing filename based on the provided path, file prefix and extension (file extension is disregarded if ext==null.) It is recommended to call UBase.setPApplet() before use so that dataPath() and sketchPath() can use information from PApplet, otherwise the directory where the application is launched is used as a root.

nextFile

public static java.lang.String nextFile(java.lang.String path,
                                        java.lang.String prefix,
                                        java.lang.String ext)
Generates auto-incrementing filename based on the provided path, file prefix and extension (file extension is disregarded if ext==null.) It is recommended to call UBase.setPApplet() before use so that dataPath() and sketchPath() can use information from PApplet, otherwise the directory where the application is launched is used as a root.

Parameters:
path -
prefix -
ext -
Returns:
